org.apache.spark.ml.linalg

Class Vectors

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.ml.linalg.Vectors

  • public class Vectors
extends Object
    Factory methods for Vector. We don't use the name Vector because Scala imports Vector by default.

            int[] indices,
            double[] values)
        Creates a sparse vector providing its index array and value array.

        Parameters:
        size - vector size.
        indices - index array, must be strictly increasing.
        values - value array, must have the same length as indices.
